p: Stochastic simulations of future population trends for Yellow-eyed penguins at Boulder Beach, show that the population will continue to decline if current threats continue unabated. Global ocean temperatures are rising ( IPCC, 2013); projections for the Tasman region until 2060 predict an increase in SST of up to 2 °C ( Oliver et al., 2014), hence future climatic conditions will not be favorable for a recovery of the YEP population.
